content: {A惊叹}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, hoho! I'm delighted to see you've brought in a scholar to help out with our ecological observation efforts.
info: 露卡瓶1-莫白_主流程文本II

content: The <style=Highlight>Ecohouse</style> will be completed <style=Highlight>tomorrow</style>. You won't be able to settle any creatures until then, but...

content: This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is full. You can now use it to water the Luca Arbor again.
